div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

10 years later i imagine my life like a traveller around the world. I 'll live with people who interest me like friendly and generous people. It's important for me to know others ways of life and meet people. I think i will not be alone. I'll have a girlfriend that i love and with whom i am close.10 years later i 'll have evolve a lot i hope. It's important to evolve.10 years later i 'll know if i was thinking good.
